title: Project Release Executor
description: Complete polyglot release workflow (version + changelog + publish) for any project type

version.description: Explicit version to release (overrides automatic detection)

releaseAs.description: Type of version bump to perform

preid.description: Prerelease identifier to use with prerelease version bumps (e.g., 'alpha', 'beta', 'rc'). Results in versions like 1.0.0-alpha.0, 1.0.0-beta.1

firstRelease.description: Indicates this is the first release. Uses git tags or registry to determine current version if version cannot be found in files. Useful when version sources are only available after first release.

show.description: Show detailed information about what would change across all workflow steps

gitCommit.description: Create a git commit with the version changes

gitCommitMessage.description: Custom git commit message. Supports {version}, {projectName}, {releaseGroupName} placeholders

gitCommitArgs.description: Additional arguments to pass to the git commit command

gitTag.description: Create a git tag for the release

gitTagMessage.description: Custom git tag message. Supports {version}, {projectName}, {releaseGroupName}, {tag} placeholders

gitTagArgs.description: Additional arguments to pass to the git tag command

ciOnly.description: Only allow git operations (commit, tag, push, GitHub release) in CI/CD environments. Checks for CI environment variable. Prevents accidental releases from local development.

gitPush.description: Push commits and tags to the remote repository

gitPushArgs.description: Additional arguments to pass to the git push command

githubRelease.description: Create a GitHub release for the tag

githubReleaseNotes.description: Custom release notes for GitHub release

githubReleaseDraft.description: Create the GitHub release as a draft

githubReleasePrerelease.description: Mark the GitHub release as a prerelease

skipCommit.description: DEPRECATED: Use gitCommit instead. Skip creating git commit

skipTag.description: DEPRECATED: Use gitTag instead. Skip creating git tag

workspaceChangelog.description: Generate a workspace-level CHANGELOG.md at the root

projectChangelogs.description: When generating workspace changelog, also generate individual project changelogs

interactive.description: Open changelog in editor for manual editing before saving

buildTarget.description: Build target to run before publishing

releaseAll.description: Release all projects in the workspace

trackDeps.description: Track workspace dependencies and automatically version dependent projects when their dependencies change

syncVersions.description: Synchronize versions across multiple projects in the workspace

syncProjects.description: Specific projects to synchronize versions with (if not specified, syncs with all projects when syncVersions is true)

syncStrategy.description: Strategy for sync versioning: 'highest' uses the highest existing version, 'bump' calculates new version from the main project

releaseGroup.description: Release group name to use for this project. Release groups allow different versioning strategies and configurations for different sets of projects.

projectsRelationship.description: How projects in this release group should be versioned: 'independent' (each project has its own version) or 'fixed' (all projects share the same version)

skipLockFileUpdate.description: Skip updating lock files (package-lock.json, yarn.lock, pnpm-lock.yaml) after version changes. By default, lock files are automatically updated if they exist.

updateLockFile.description: Explicitly control whether to update lock files. Set to false to skip lock file updates (same as skipLockFileUpdate). By default, lock files are automatically updated if they exist.
